GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Update Source Code By Revenue Attribute Canvassing
GlobalChangeSpec.Description: Sets source codes based on revenue attribute value, based on revenue selection
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: HEIFERNET\khamling
GlobalChangeSpec.DisplayName: Update Source Code By Revenue Attribute Canvassing
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_SOURCECODES_BY_REVATTRVALUE_CANVASSING ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @SOURCECODES xml, @ATTRIBUTECATEGORYID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, @REVENUESELECTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) as set nocount off;
declare @I_MAX integer declare @SC_COUNT integer declare @REVENUEID uniqueidentifier declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate
DECLARE @REVENUESELECTION TABLE ( id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY);
INSERT INTO @REVENUESELECTION SELECT id FROM dbo.Ufn_idsetreader_getresults_guid(@REVENUESELECTIONID)
declare @SCTEMP table ( AttrValue uniqueidentifier, SourceCode nvarchar(30) )
declare @handle int exec sp_xml_preparedocument @handle output, @SOURCECODES
insert into @SCTEMP select AttrValue, SourceCode from openxml(@handle, '/SOURCECODES/ITEM') with ( ATTRVALUE uniqueidentifier 'ATTRVALUE', SOURCECODE nvarchar(30) 'SOURCECODE' )
CREATE TABLE #SC ( AttrValue uniqueidentifier, SourceCode nvarchar(30) ) INSERT #SC SELECT * FROM @SCTEMP
--NEED TO GET ATTRIBUTE TABLE FROM TYPE ENTERED. --testing with "MSource" attribute for now. DECLARE @ATTRTABLE VARCHAR(100); DECLARE @SQL VARCHAR(2000);
select @ATTRTABLE = replace('ATTRIBUTE' + convert(nvarchar(100),id),'-','') from attributecategory where attributerecordtypeid in ( select id from attributerecordtype where recordtypeid in ( select id from recordtype where name='Revenue' ) ) and attributecategory.id = @ATTRIBUTECATEGORYID
CREATE TABLE #RS(id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER) INSERT #RS SELECT * FROM @REVENUESELECTION
--NEEDED TO PREVENT UPDATE QUERY BELOW FROM TRYING TO SET SOURCECODE=NULL IF THE ATTRIBUTE DOESN'T EXIST ON THE REVENUE TRANSACTION set @SQL = 'delete from #RS where id not in (select id from '+ @ATTRTABLE +' )' EXEC (@SQL)
-- update -- REVENUE -- set -- SOURCECODE = (select S.SOURCECODE FROM attributeA4A371DFAB784DEF84762248DA5D4D2B ATTR join @SCTEMP S on ATTR.VALUE = S.ATTRVALUE where ATTR.ID = REVENUE.ID) -- where -- ID in (select ID from @REVENUESELECTION)
-- update -- REVENUE -- set -- SOURCECODE = (select S.SOURCECODE FROM @ATTRTABLE ATTR join @SCTEMP S on ATTR.VALUE = S.ATTRVALUE where ATTR.ID = REVENUE.ID) -- where -- ID in (select ID from @REVENUESELECTION)
set @SQL = 'update REVENUE set SOURCECODE = (select upper(S.SOURCECODE) FROM '+ @ATTRTABLE +' ATTR join #SC S on ATTR.canvassingcitiescodeid = S.ATTRVALUE where ATTR.ID = REVENUE.ID) where ID in (select ID from #RS)' EXEC (@SQL)
set @NUMBEREDITED=@@ROWCOUNT
DROP TABLE #SC DROP TABLE #RS end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
